answerText: Noel Coward[10] The central couple of this Coward play uses the word "Sollocks" to stop their arguments. Amanda and Elyot abandon their new, younger spouses to be with each other in it, even though they divorced several years ago.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Maryland B and Michigan A | 18 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Ernest Friedman is eventually repelled by the bizarre love triangle between Otto, Gilda, and Leo in this man's play Design for Living. For 10 points each: [10] Name this playwright of Present Laughter and Hay Fever.
